medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports bloating for several days with decreased appetite. Abdominal pain started today, primarily in the lower abdomen, with some periumbilical discomfort. Pain was constant throughout the day and worsened after eating soup. Patient has had mild nausea without vomiting. Normal bowel movements until today, with no bowel movement today. Denies any prior abdominal surgeries. Patient also endorses fevers.
